import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import AuthContext from '../Context/AuthContext' import axios from 'axios' import './Header.css' import { Button, FlexboxGrid, Modal, Input } from 'rsuite' export default function Header() { const { urlServer } = useContext(AuthContext) const [showModal1, setShowModal1] = useState(false) const [showModal2, setShowModal2] = useState(false) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const login = () => { setLoading(true) axios.post(`${urlServer}/login`) } return (

Roitinfo

{/* Modal per il login */} setShowModal1(false)}> Login

Non hai un accoutn?

{/* Modal per la registrazione */} setShowModal2(false)}> Registrati
) }
